triples.evidence: when an invisible gamma ray photon strikes the crystal, it produces a tiny flash of visible light
They are specially manufactured scintillation crystals, the heart of gamma cameras

evidence: they are specially manufactured scintillation crystals, the heart of gamma cameras.
they convert high-energy radiation, which our eyes cannot see, into visible photons that we can detect.
This conversion process is the critical first step in turning radioactive emissions inside the body into signals that we can ultimately form into an image.

concepts.term: convert high-energy radiation, which our eyes cannot see, into visible photons that we can detect
turning radioactive emissions inside the body into signals that we can ultimately form into an image

evidence: They are specially manufactured scintillation crystals, the heart of gamma cameras.
when an invisible gamma ray photon strikes the crystal, it produces a tiny flash of visible light.
This conversion process is the critical first step in turning radioactive emissions inside the body into signals that we can ultimately form into an image.
If you continuously bombard the crystal with gamma rays, you'll see flashes of light-very faint to the naked eye, but easily measurable with sensitive detectors.
